post_text: June 9, 2015 at 6:34 PM#1I'm trying to write a macro that will toggle between an existing stage wash and a preset look (such as for a video roll). The trick is that I want it to be sensitive to fader levels (and therefore be able to restore to any look on stage). Is there a way to detect the level a fader is at, and store that as a variable to be recalled later?So pretty much: SetUserVar $Fader1Level = {value of the fader}
